attributes.action: Suspend parliament and Call an immediate general election
attributes.additional_details: The people of the UK have totally lost confidence in the governments ability to govern the UK to the benefit and best interests of the British people and require an immediate general election to allow a democratically tested potential change of government.
attributes.background: Suspend parliament and call an immediate general election

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
